author: Staff Reporter
text:
Several doctors at Rajiv Gandhi Government General Hospital refused to work for a brief while after an attendant of one of the patients allegedly abused a doctor, police sources said.

Around 9.15 p.m., three attendants came in with a patient to the hospital and got into an argument with one of the doctors and one of the attendants allegedly abused him.

Soon after the incident, several doctors walked out and demanded the arrest of the person, sources added.

Further investigation is on.
title: Doctors at GH walk out due to ‘abusive’ attendant
